allow: Bash(PGPASSWORD=kPnrGuFeJeuVprXzhhO2oLVE14f509KV psql -h 147.93.15.121 -p 5434 -U sienge_app -d sienge_data -c "SELECT table_name, column_name, data_type, is_nullable FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_schema = ''public'' ORDER BY table_name, ordinal_position;")

Bash(PGPASSWORD=kPnrGuFeJeuVprXzhhO2oLVE14f509KV psql -h 147.93.15.121 -p 5434 -U sienge_app -d sienge_data -c "SELECT ''clientes'' as table_name, COUNT(*) as total FROM clientes UNION ALL SELECT ''empresas'', COUNT(*) FROM empresas UNION ALL SELECT ''empreendimentos'', COUNT(*) FROM empreendimentos UNION ALL SELECT ''contratos_venda'', COUNT(*) FROM contratos_venda UNION ALL SELECT ''contas_receber'', COUNT(*) FROM contas_receber UNION ALL SELECT ''movimentos_bancarios'', COUNT(*) FROM movimentos_bancarios UNION ALL SELECT ''titulos_receber'', COUNT(*) FROM titulos_receber UNION ALL SELECT ''parcelas_contas_receber'', COUNT(*) FROM parcelas_contas_receber ORDER BY total DESC;")
